text: Meihakuna ware no shirushi ga, kare-ra ni dokuju sa rete mo, kare-ra wa iu. `Kore wa hitori no otoko ga, anata gata no sosen no sūhai shite ita kamigami kara somuka seyou to suru nodearu.' Mata iu. `Kore wa tada netsuzō shita,-tsukuri-gotodearu.' Mata shinri o shinjinai-sha-tachi wa, sore ga kare-ra ni arawareru to,`koreha mei-ra ka ni majutsu nisuginai.' To iu
